name: Puke on the Nuke
description:
WASD or Arrow keys to move. Jump on the robots heads to kill them, if you walk out from a block onto their heads, they won't die.  

The neighbouring city has been nuked, and you know that your city is next on the list, it's just a matter of time until you city is nuked too. Therefore you need to make your way past guarding robots and razor blades in order to sabotage the nuke.

Made in two hours and 45 minutes for the TriJam (I can update it with the time i have left if you find any bugs). Game made in Godot and music made in BeepBox.

Updated the game and added some sound effects, it took me 12 minutes of work so now I have actively worked with the game for 2 hours and 57 minutes :) Feel free to send a screenshot if you managed to sabotage the nuke.

Updated the game a second time, I fixed a bug were the bots wouldn't die sometimes even tough you jumped on their heads, tweaked the hitboxes of the trampolines a tiny bit and added four extra blocks. It took exactly 1 minute and 34 seconds so I am now on 2 hours 58 minutes and 34 seconds.
